quote: Yes, but I'd rather be friends with fun people that I don't meet often
author: Tsumugi Kotobuki

quote: I've always wanted someone to ask me if I would like fries with that
author: Tsumugi Kotobuki

quote: She always gives you her all, no matter what
author: Tsumugi Kotobuki

quote: If you were a boy, I am sure you would be very popular with the girls!
author: Tsumugi Kotobuki

quote: You and Mio-chan…you’re hitting each other and bonding through bodily contact, right?
author: Tsumugi Kotobuki
